Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Homan/Congress
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan  buses temp. rerouted NB: Homan, Harrison, Kedzie, Jackson and Homan; SB Homan, Jackson, Central Park, Harrison and Homan: near Homan/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Homan/Congress, due to fire department activity near Homan/Congress.

Northbound  buses will operate via Homan, Harrison, Kedzie, Jackson and Homan including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Homan, Jackson, Central Park, Harrison and Homan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard- bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard- bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Skokie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/43rd
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 43rd, Cottage Grove, 39th & King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/43rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 43rd, Cottage Grove, 39th and then resume their normal route at King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/43rd.

Allow extra travel time.
